caption.p: Time-dependent changes in the numbers of children hospitalized due to Mycoplasma pneumoniae (MP) pneumonia according to clinical macrolide sensitivity. a Number of children hospitalized with MP pneumonia classified as macrolide-sensitive (MSMP), macrolide-refractory (MRMP), and macrolide less-effective (MLEP). b Time-dependent changes in the ratios of MSMP/total MP pneumonia, MRMP pneumonia/total MP pneumonia, and MLEP pneumonia/total MP pneumonia during the study period
